categories: Category:Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic: War

nodes.text: Knights of the Old Republic: War 3

Knights of the Old Republic: War 3 is the third issue in the upcoming Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic: War comic book series. Set shortly after Knights of the Old Republic 50, the series follows Zayne Carrick as he gets drafted into the Mandalorian Wars. This issue was released on March 14, 2012.

Peace-loving Jedi Zayne Carrick is an unwilling recruit in the war between the Republic and the Mandalorians. When he discovers that his homeworld is about to become the center of a battle zone, Zayne is prepared to do everything to prevent bloodshed—like calling in a favor from an old friend and putting together a complicated ruse!
